SELECT yr_dt AS yrDt , mon_dt AS monDt , dy_dt AS dyDt , CONCAT(yr_dt, '.', mon_dt, '.', dy_dt) AS baseDate , unit , val FROM kospi_index WHERE CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt, dy_dt) = ( SELECT CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt, dy_dt) FROM kospi_index ORDER BY CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt, dy_dt) DESC
)

SELECT yr_dt AS yrDt , mon_dt AS monDt , dy_dt AS dyDt , CONCAT(yr_dt, '.', mon_dt, '.', dy_dt) AS baseDate , unit , val FROM kosdaq_index WHERE CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt, dy_dt) = ( SELECT CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt, dy_dt) FROM kospi_index ORDER BY CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt, dy_dt) DESC
)

SELECT yr_dt AS yrDt , mon_dt AS monDt , CONCAT(yr_dt, '.', mon_dt) AS baseDate , unit , val FROM oil_price WHERE CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt) = ( SELECT CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt) FROM oil_price ORDER BY CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt) DESC
)

SELECT CONCAT(yr_dt, '/', mon_dt, '/', dy_dt) AS kospiDate , val FROM kospi_index WHERE CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt) BETWEEN 201912 AND ( SELECT CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt) FROM kospi_index ORDER BY yr_dt DESC LIMIT 1 )

SELECT CONCAT(ki.yr_dt, '/', ki.mon_dt, '/', ki.dy_dt) AS date , ki.val , 'kospi' AS type FROM kospi_index ki INNER JOIN base_rate br ON CONCAT(ki.yr_dt, ki.mon_dt, ki.dy_dt) = CONCAT(br.yr_dt, br.mon_dt, br.dy_dt) WHERE ki.yr_dt BETWEEN ( SELECT yr_dt FROM kospi_index ORDER BY yr_dt DESC LIMIT 1 ) - #{searchPeriod} AND ( SELECT yr_dt FROM kospi_index ORDER BY yr_dt DESC LIMIT 1 ) UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(br.yr_dt, '/', br.mon_dt, '/', br.dy_dt) AS baseDate , br.val , 'base' AS type FROM base_rate br INNER JOIN kospi_index ki ON CONCAT(ki.yr_dt, ki.mon_dt, ki.dy_dt) = CONCAT(br.yr_dt, br.mon_dt, br.dy_dt) WHERE br.yr_dt BETWEEN ( SELECT yr_dt FROM base_rate ORDER BY yr_dt DESC LIMIT 1 ) - #{searchPeriod} AND ( SELECT yr_dt FROM base_rate ORDER BY yr_dt DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY date

SELECT CONCAT(ki.yr_dt, '/', ki.mon_dt, '/', ki.dy_dt) AS date , ki.val , 'kospi' AS type FROM kospi_index ki INNER JOIN base_rate br ON CONCAT(ki.yr_dt, ki.mon_dt, ki.dy_dt) = CONCAT(br.yr_dt, br.mon_dt, br.dy_dt) WHERE CONCAT(ki.yr_dt, ki.mon_dt, ki.dy_dt) BETWEEN #{searchStartDate} AND #{searchEndDate} UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(br.yr_dt, '/', br.mon_dt, '/', br.dy_dt) AS baseDate , br.val , 'base' AS type FROM base_rate br INNER JOIN kospi_index ki ON CONCAT(ki.yr_dt, ki.mon_dt, ki.dy_dt) = CONCAT(br.yr_dt, br.mon_dt, br.dy_dt) WHERE CONCAT(br.yr_dt, br.mon_dt, br.dy_dt) BETWEEN #{searchStartDate} AND #{searchEndDate} ORDER BY date
